description: Yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. With experience in various tech initiatives, yeehaa now focuses on building effective ecosystems and bringing people together around shared values. Based in Taipei, he continues to innovate in the intersection of education, technology, and community building.
blurb: Yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, combines academic insight with tech innovation. Founder of Offcourse and creator of Superconnectors, he's reshaping education and knowledge sharing while fostering inclusive digital communities from Taipei.
